featured.title: Lombardia
featured.subtitle: Where Alps Meet Elegance
featured.description: Lombardia is a different Italy altogether. Cooler, wealthier, more demanding. This is not the land of tax incentives or bargain retirements â€” it's the industrial, financial, and logistical heart of the country. What it offers is substance: Europe-class hospitals, high-speed rail, international airports, and infrastructure that feels closer to northern Europe. For the right person, it might be the most strategic place in Italy to land.
